name: Island Survivor (ursagames)
description:
Made in 48 hours for solo comp entry of LDJAM 52

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/island-survival

Tools used:

  • Godot 3.5 
  • Pyxel Edit
  • Audacity
  • beepbox

Sorry for the music, I made an attempt, but it's not one of my strong points and was already short on time.
